creator: WestCoastMotors
descriptionHtml:
Our new app has everything you need to get around with Borders Buses. It’s packed full of everything you’ll need to get mobile on the bus.

Mobile Tickets Purchase mobile tickets securely with a debit/credit card and scan when boarding - no more searching for cash!

Live Departures: Browse and view bus stops on the map, explore upcoming departures, or check out the routes from a stop to see where you could travel next.

Journey Planning: Plan your commute, trip to the shops or night out with friends. It’s now even easier to plan ahead with Borders Buses.

Timetables: We’ve squeezed all of our routes and timetables into the palm of your hand.

Favourites: You can quickly save your favourite Departure Boards, Timetables and Journeys, with quick access from one convenient menu.

Disruptions: You’ll be able to keep up to date with service changes directly from our Twitter feeds inside the app.

As always, we welcome your feedback. You can send it to us via the app.
descriptionShort: Our new app has everything you need to get around with Borders Buses.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We’ve added zone information including maps at checkout to help you buy the right ticket
- Widgets now have more customisation options

creator: WestCoastMotors
descriptionHtml:
Our new app has everything you need to get around with Borders Buses. It’s packed full of everything you’ll need to get mobile on the bus.

Mobile Tickets Purchase mobile tickets securely with a debit/credit card and scan when boarding - no more searching for cash!

Live Departures: Browse and view bus stops on the map, explore upcoming departures, or check out the routes from a stop to see where you could travel next.

Journey Planning: Plan your commute, trip to the shops or night out with friends. It’s now even easier to plan ahead with Borders Buses.

Timetables: We’ve squeezed all of our routes and timetables into the palm of your hand.

Favourites: You can quickly save your favourite Departure Boards, Timetables and Journeys, with quick access from one convenient menu.

Disruptions: You’ll be able to keep up to date with service changes directly from our Twitter feeds inside the app.

NEW! Watch apps: The wearable tech trend is showing no sign of going away, so for those of you with smartwatches, we've made new watch apps for you. You can find the stops closest to you, look up departures from your favourite stops and send any departure board to your watch while using the main app.

As always, we welcome your feedback. You can send it to us via the app.
descriptionShort: Our new app has everything you need to get around with Borders Buses.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixes issue with a rare crash on the Ticket and Timetables list pages

Live Departures: Browse and view bus stops on the map, explore upcoming departures, or check out the routes from a stop to see where you could travel next.

Journey Planning: Plan your commute, trip to the shops or night out with friends. It’s now even easier to plan ahead with Borders Buses.

Timetables: We’ve squeezed all of our routes and timetables into the palm of your hand.

Favourites: You can quickly save your favourite Departure Boards, Timetables and Journeys, with quick access from one convenient menu.

Disruptions: You’ll be able to keep up to date with service changes directly from our Twitter feeds inside the app.

As always, we welcome your feedback. You can send it to us via the app.
descriptionShort: Our new app has everything you need to get around with Borders Buses.
